author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Bharathiar Palkalaikoodam in collaboration with Directorate of Art and Culture and South Zone Cultural Centre, Thanjavur, will host concerts to promote Tamil Isai on Friday.

Artists will render songs by Bharati, Bharathidasan, Puduvai Sivam, Thayumanavar and Gopalakrishna Bharati. The concerts will begin at 7.30 a.m. and wrap up at 9.00 p.m at Kamban Kalai Arangam.
title: Music concert tomorrow
